data.name: Sample - Azure Active Directory - 2.2.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Azure Active Directory" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: List Users
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of users from Azure Active Directory based on the input parameters such as the query for filtering users you have specified.

workflows.name: Delete User
workflows.description: Deletes a specific user's account from Azure Active Directory, based on the Object ID or User Principal Name you have specified.

workflows.name: > Detect SignIns Violations
workflows.description: Checks if the user signed in after a set date

routes.name: Format SignIn events -> Signed In After Offboard
Get SignIn Events -> Format SignIn events
Signed In After Offboard -> Copy of Match
routes.label: no

workflows.name: List Registered Users
workflows.description: List registered users for a device

workflows.name: Remove Member
workflows.description: Remove member from a group.

workflows.name: Enable User
workflows.description: Enables a specific user's account in Azure Active Directory, based on the Object ID or User Principal Name you have specified.

workflows.name: Disable User
workflows.description: Disables a specific user's account in Azure Active Directory, based on the Object ID or User Principal Name you have specified.

workflows.name: Get People
workflows.description: Retrieve a collection of person objects ordered by their relevance to the user, which is determined by the user's communication and collaboration patterns, and business relationships

workflows.name: List User Owned Objects
workflows.description: Get the list of directory objects that are owned by a user

workflows.name: Get Managers
workflows.description: List the groups the user is member of

workflows.name: Get Group Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the details of a particular group from Azure Active Directory.

arguments.title: Azure Active Directory: Get Group Details

workflows.name: Generic API Call
workflows.description: Make a Generic MS Graph API Call

workflows.name: List Devices
workflows.description: List devices

workflows.name: Get User Membership
workflows.description: List the groups the user is member of

workflows.name: Add User
workflows.description: Creates a new user in Azure Active Directory, based on the User Principal Name, Display Name, Password, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: List Direct Reports
workflows.description: List user's direct reports

workflows.name: Add Member
workflows.description: Add member to a group.

workflows.name: List Groups
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of groups from Azure Active Directory based on the input parameters such as the query for filtering groups you have specified.

workflows.name: List Group Members
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of member users of a particular group from Azure Active Directory based on the input parameters such as the query for filtering groups members you have specified

arguments.title: Azure Active Directory: List Group Members

workflows.name: Get User Details
workflows.description: Retrieves specific information for a specific user from Azure Active Directory, based on the Object ID or User Principal Name you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Active Directory: Get User Details

workflows.name: List SignIns Events
workflows.description: Retrieves the list sign ins events from Azure Active Directory based on the input parameters such as the query for filtering users you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Active Directory: List SignIns Events

workflows.name: List User Owned Devices
workflows.description: Lists the devices that are owned by a user

workflows.name: Reset Password
workflows.description: Resets the password for an existing Azure Active Directory user, based on the Object ID or User Principal Name, password, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Revoke SignIn Sessions
workflows.description: Resets the password for an existing Azure Active Directory user, based on the Object ID or User Principal Name, password, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: List Registered Owners
workflows.description: List registered owners for a device
